mapper.select: select * from party where party_id IN (select DISTINCT party_id from party_member where user_id = #{userId})
mapper.update: update party_member set status = '1', reg_date=now() where user_id=#{userId} and party_id=#{partyId}
mapper.delete: delete from party_member where user_id=#{userId} and party_id=#{partyId}
